content: I've been seeing ?_ a few places, but I'm having a bit of a hard time figuring out what it is (and searching for this token is a bit hard). Any pointers would be appreciated

This is a token used in places such as refine to indicate that a subgoal should be made. For example, if you have a = b - > b = a \/ true as the goal, then refine fun x => \< ?_, ?_ \> will create the new goals b = a and true (with h : a = b added to the goal state for both.)

apologies for the bad ascii
